title: Stan Mercer
text: Stan Mercer (11 September 1919 – 2003) was an English professional <a href="association%20football">footballer</a> who played in the <a href="English%20Football%20League">Football League</a> for <a href="Accrington%20Stanley%20F.C.%20%281891%29">Accrington Stanley</a>, <a href="Leicester%20City%20F.C.">Leicester City</a> and <a href="Mansfield%20Town%20F.C.">Mansfield Town</a> where he also had a spell as manager.
